title: Input schema for the apify_project actor.

targetActorId.title: Target Actor ID
targetActorId.description: Actor ID which mapped input will run.

targetTaskId.title: Target Task ID
targetTaskId.description: Task ID which mapped input will run.

inputMapping.title: Input mapping function
inputMapping.description: Function that will create input for target actor or task. It has one parameter context with context.originalInput and context.parsedInputTableCsv. The parsedInputTableCsv are parsed data from CSV passed from keboola extractor. Each line is represent as object, where key is name of column.

inputTableRecord.title: Input table record
inputTableRecord.description: This field will be set from Keboola integration.

skipMetamorph.title: Not using Metamorph
skipMetamorph.description: If true, then Metamorph will not be used. Use only in specific cases if metamorph cannot be used for some reason. This option is not recommended and use more compute units.
